alert.note: Alert for Coos; Curry (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued November 05 at 8:19PM PST until November 05 at 8:45PM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: The National Weather Service in Medford has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Curry County in southwestern Oregon... Southern Coos County in southwestern Oregon... * Until 845 PM PST. * At 818 PM PST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Humbug Mountain State Park, or 10 miles southeast of Port Orford, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Landfalling waterspouts are possible. * Locations impacted include... Humbug Mountain State Park and Ophir. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
